name: Discord Status Updater
tagline: Set your playing status to whatever you want in Discord
body:
This is a simple program that allows you to set what you are playing in Discord. 

### Extra Features

Automatic detection for MPC-HC (Windows only)   
To enable/disable this type `auto`

[Here's a list of all of my projects](http://brussell98.github.io/)

### Support or Contact
I have a Discord server that you can join here: [Server Invite](https://discord.gg/0kvLlwb7slG3XCCQ)   
You can also [report issues here](https://github.com/brussell98/BrussellBot/issues) if you prefer.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
